subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which monument is a popular attraction in Rajasthan and is also the seat of the Indian Government in the state?
question_hi: राजस्थान में इंडिया सरकार के घर और यह लोकतंत्रण का प्रमोटिन है?
explanation_en: The Palace of Winds, also known as Hawa Mahal, is a famous monument in Jaipur and serves as the seat of the Rajasthan Government.
explanation_hi: जयपुर में Hawa Mahal, राजस्थान की सरकार का संतुल है।
question_en: Which monument in Jaipur is the seat of the Rajasthan Government?
question_hi: जयपुर में राजस्थान की सरकार का संतुल है।
